Room.Name: Sharkey's Bordello
Room.ShortDescription: This bordello is a place where men come to relieve sexual tension.
Room.LongDescription: As you look about, you notice a wonderfully sexy woman, who gives you a wink back. It must be time for you to make your move. The furniture seems to be rather shabby and poorly kept, and the doctor's certificate on the wall is long out of date. The place has a very musty smell to it.
